‘We see them every day’: Hundreds of hospital visits to deal with frostbite in Winnipeg this winter
By
Devon McKendrick
Published:
February 20, 2025 at 6:08PM EST
A nurse is seen treating frostbite on someone's finger on Feb. 20, 2025. (Glenn Pismenny/CTV News Winnipeg)
